detectors.description:
TroNetwork.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#77-82) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#79)
detectors.markdown:
[TroNetwork.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#L77-L82) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:

detectors.description:
TroNetwork.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#84-90) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#85)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#87)

detectors.description: Variable TroNetwork._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 16000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#8)
	- TroNetwork.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#59-61)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#9)
	- TroNetwork.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#63-65)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#10)
	- TroNetwork.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#67-69)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#11)
	- TroNetwork.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#77-82)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TroNetwork.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#71-75)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#12)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#28)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TroNetwork.sol#28-30)
